  Mujeres que con esfuerzo y dedicación salen a delante sin importar las adversidades y problemas que vengan en el camino. Un caso particular es el de la señora María Elena Sánchez A. la presidenta del grupo Micaela Bastida II, de 45 años de edad soltera y con un hijo menor de edad, sale adelante cada día que pasa dándole empeño y esmero a la sastrería que tiene como fuente de ingresos. Ella comenzó con este negocio propio a raíz de que no tenía con quien dejar al cuidado a su menor hijo, es así como surge este pequeña sastrería en su casa, que día a día crese cada vez mas. El presente préstamo lo invertirá en mercadería nueva (telas e instrumentos para su negocio). María Elena Sánchez es solo una de las 8 integrantes que con esfuerzo y entusiasmo salen adelante para el bienestar de ellas y sus familias.
texts.en:
A group of women with initiative, values and good business proposals for today form the Micaela Bastidas II group.  It has 8 members interested in development.  The group started operating 2 years and 8 months ago.  They are called Micaela Bastidas II because they all reside in that same neighborhood. They are women who get ahead through effort and dedication despite adversities and problems that might arise along the way.

A particular case is Mrs. María Elena Sánchez A., group President.  She is 45 years old, single and has a minor son.  She gets ahead every day working hard and with dedication in her tailor shop which is her source of income. She started the business because she didn’t have anyone to leave her son with so she started a shop in her own home which every day grows more.

The current loan will be used to buy new merchandise (fabrics and tools for her business).

María Elena Sánchez is just one of the 8 group members who, through their own efforts and enthusiasm, get ahead seeking their and their families’ wellbeing.

loans.use: To buy new merchandise.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es: La Sra. Aracely A. R., ha  obtenido este crédito el cual esta  destinado para complementar la remodelación de su vivienda en donde esta realizando ampliando un cuarto, cambio de techo y pegado de cerámica y pago de mano de obra, nuestra cliente ha manifestado la importancia que ha sido nuestra institución y la oportunidad que ha recibido al haberle proporcionado dicho crédito siendo una cliente asalariada pero a mostrado tanto para nuestra institución responsabilidad,  como nosotros una alternativa de mejoramiento habitacional.
texts.en:
Mrs. Aracely A. R. has obtained this loan which will be used to complement her home where she is enlarging a room, reroofing, installing tile and paying for labor costs.

Our client has stated the importance our institution has had for her and the opportunity it has provided by granting the loan.

Being a salaried employee she has nonetheless demonstrated responsibility towards our institution as we have tas an alterntive for her home improvements.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Juana Dominga

texts.es: La Sra. Juana Dominga G. R. ella es trabajadora activa de la Alcaldía municipal San Rafael del Sur   ella  se desempeña  como conserje, tiene  un año de trabajar para esta institución,  tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y los ha realizado para comprar materiales de construcción para mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para cambio de techo la cocina  de su casa, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Juana Dominga G. R. has been employed as a Caretaker for the City of San Rafael del Sur for a year.  She has a school aged son.

She has had two loans with CEPRODEL that have been used to buy building materials and supplies for home improvements.  This loan is to reroof the kitchen.

Ceprodel loans have been of great benefit for her in that they have allowed for an improvement in her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To buy zinc metal sheeting and wood beams.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy computers

loans.name: Arely Sugey

texts.es:
La Joven Arely Sugey Chavarría P., se dedica a vender sopa y nacatamales, es madre soltera de un niño de 2 añitos, trabaja por cuenta propia.

Lleva ya 36 créditos con ceprodel los cuales los utiliza para compra de insumos para la preparación de sus ventas, ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable en sus pagos.
texts.en:
Arely Sugey Chavarría P. sells soup and nacatamales (Nicaraguan tamales popular as weekend fare).  She is a single mother of a 2-year-old son.  She works on her own initiative.

She has had 36 Ceprodel loans that she has used to buy ingredients to prepare the food she sells.

She has shown herself to be a very responsible person with respect to her repayments.

loans.use: To buy ingredients.

loans.name: Celsa Arelis

texts.es:
La señora Celsa Arelis B. es comerciante se dedica a la venta de bebidas como gaseosas, gatorade, agua helada, jugos, etc.  en la terminal de buses el bisne Chinandega, habita en el barrio Divino Niño, tiene tres hijos todos en edades escolares, su esposo trabaja por cuenta propia en albañilería de ayudante.

La señora Celsa Arelis B. es muy trabajadora y paga en tiempo y forma todos sus abonos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Celsa Arelis B. is a merchant who sells soft drinks, Gatorade, cold water, juices, etc. at Chinandega’s El Bisne bus terminal.  She lives in the Divino Niño neighborhood and has three, school aged children.  Her husband works on his own as a Bricklayer’s Assistant.

Mrs. Celsa Arelis B. is very hard working and always pays back her loans in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy stock items to sell.

loans.name: Ricardo José

texts.es: El Señor Ricardo José L. C. se dedica al comercio su actividad a fin es venta de CD, DVD y Artesanías  su localización es el centro de la ciudad de Estelí, teniendo gran demanda en dicha actividad lleva un control especifico en cuadernos ordinarios de sus ventas y compras, obtiene altas ganancias ya que sus compras son a C$6.00 p/unidad y sus ventas a C$15.00 por unidad. Sus compras por mayor las realiza en Managua lo que le permite comprar a un bajo precio y este le da mas ganancias.
texts.en:
Mr. Ricardo José L. C. is a merchant.  He sells CDs, DVDs and crafts.  His locale is in downtown Estelí.  

He has a lot of demand for his products and he keeps meticulous records of his purchases and sales in ordinary notebooks.

He earns high profits because he buys CDs at C$6.00 each and sells them at C$15.00 each.  He buys his stock at wholesale in Managua which allows him to buy at a low price and thereby earn higher profits.

loans.use: To buy 4000 CDs and 300 crafts.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es: Perfil del Cliente 	El Sr. Rogelio G. S., es un primer crédito el que será ocupado para la construcción de dos cuatros 4x4, el esta siendo beneficiado con financiamiento el que le permite mejor su vivienda, al mismo tiempo le permite a él tener la oportunidad de cubrir esta necesidad y solventar su proyecto. El es asalariado y es de gran importancia para él que nuestra institución abra sus puertas y podamos ser impulsadores de las innovaciones de nuestros clientes
texts.en: Profile of the client:  Sr. Rogelio G. S. will use this first loan for the construction of two rooms, 4 meters by 4 meters.  He is being benefited by the financing, which will allow him to improve his way of life by permitting him to have the opportunity of meeting this necessity and carrying out his project.  He is a wage earner, and it of great importance to him that our institution has opened its doors and that we can provide encouragement to our clients’ innovations.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials.

loans.name: Jorge Ernesto

texts.es: Perfil del Cliente 	Jorge Ernesto A. Herrera, es un cliente que por primera vez el esta trabajado con nosotros, el esta adquiriendo este crédito para comprar hierro estándar  5qq, 100 unidades de piedras canteras y 14 bolsas de cemento y tambien cubrir pago de mano de obra de la construcción en reparación de su vivienda es un asalariado pero tiene la oportunidad de optar del financiamiento y proyectarse
texts.en:
Jorge Ernesto A. Herrera is a client who is working with us for the first time.  He is acquiring this loan to buy 5 quintales (1 quintal=46 kilos) of standard iron rods, 100 paving stones, 14 bags of cement and also to pay labor costs involved in home repairs.

He is a salaried employee but has the opportunity to opt for financing and go forth.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies and pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Pedro Leonardo

texts.es: Perfil del Cliente 	El Sr. Pedro Leonardo R. B., es un cliente activo y con un excelente record crediticio, hemos sido alternativa económica  en cada una de sus actividades ya que el a obtenido créditos agropecuario y pecuarios, en periodos correspondientes a las cosechas y sus otras opciones de sobrevivencia,  el nos reconoce como una institución potencial, es un hombre dedicado a sus labores, casado, tiene cuatro hijos los cuales sosn independiente y trabajan por su propio negocios , responsable con sus compromisos.
texts.en: Client's Profile	Mr. Pedro Leonardo R. B. is an active client with excellent credit history. We have been an economic alternative in each one of his activities. He has received agricultural and livestock loans. During crop growing season and other options he undertakes for survival he realizes we are an institution with great potential. He is a dedicated and hardworking man, married, and has four children who are independent and work in their own businesses and are responsible for themselves.

loans.use: The purchase of 3 livestock.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys es una  mujer muy laboriosa, de 57 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos que ya son mayores de edad. Con mucho esfuerzo, Gladys logró recuperarse económicamente, luego que cayera enferma, por lo que descuido un poco su negocio, que es la venta de ropa. Poco a poco esta logrando reponerse y ahora visita a sus clientes para ofrecerles diversas prendas a las señoras. Sus clientes generalmente son sus vecinas de su barrio y demás familiares que la visitan, que hacen que su negocio sea rentable.  Esta muy contenta de retomar su negocio, ya que le gusta, estar al contacto con sus clientes, además de la venta de ropa, también vende productos de belleza, negocio que le esta dando buenas rentas, aunque lo más difícil es cuando le tardan en pagar, tiene que cubrir ese pago de su bolsillo a la empresa proveedora. Lleva muchos años en esta labor, por lo que espera instalar un negocio de comida, ya que muchos le han pronosticado éxitos en ello, por su buena sazón. Este es su 21avo crédito con MFP, por lo que se ha comprometido nuevamente en ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas, considerando este crédito muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más ropa y productos de belleza, para poder atender a más clientes.
texts.en:
Gladys, 57, is a very hard working woman.  She lives in her own house with her husband and two children who are now adults.  With much effort Gladys managed to recover economically after becoming ill and neglecting her clothing sales business a bit.

She’s gradually been recovering and now visits her customers to offer various articles of clothing to the ladies.  Her customers are generally her neighbors and other relatives that visit her and make her business profitable.

She is very happy to restart her business because she likes it; she enjoys contact with her customers.  Besides clothes she also sells beauty supplies, a business that is producing good profits although a difficulty with it is delayed payments which she then has to cover with her own funds to her suppliers.

She has been in this business for many years so she is hoping to set up a food business since many have foreseen much success in it for her thanks to her tasty preparations.

This is her 21st loan with MFP and she once again commits to prompt repayments since she considers these loans to be very useful for her business’ progress.

She will use the requested funds to buy more clothing and beauty products for better customer service.

loans.use: To stock up on articles of clothing.

loans.name: Heyler Geovanny

texts.es:
El joven Heyler Geovanny C. L. es trabajador de la Alcaldía de Chinandega se desempeña como contador en el área de Tesorería,  es soltero y no tiene hijos, solicito créditos para cubrir gastos personales.
El Joven Heyler C. L. lleva ya 6 créditos con ceprodel y siempre ha pagado en tiempo y forma.
texts.en:
Heyler Geovanny C. L. works for the City of Chinandega as an Accountant in the Treasury.  He is single and has no children.  He asked for funds to cover personal expenses.

He has had 6 loans with Ceprodel and has always repaid on time.

loans.use: For personal expenses.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: La Sra. Teresa V. González, esta trabajando por primera vez con nuestra institución, y para ella es su primer crédito de lo que va de su larga trayectoria comercial ella  hace tortillas para vender,  ella tiene su propia materia prima, pero es una persona muy proyectada y viendo mas hacia el futuro por lo que ella realiza su crédito para garantizar su trabajo en el transcurso de estos meses, ella obtiene utilidades de la venta de su negocio, es una señora muy luchadora porque tiene 20 años existencia en este ramo lo que le permite tener estabilidad.
texts.en:
Mrs. Teresa V. González is working with our institution for the first time.  This is her first loan in her long commercial history selling tortillas.  

She has her own raw materials but, being a forward looking person, she sees that a loan can guarantee her work for the next few months.  She earns profits from her sales.  

She’s a tenacious woman who has worked in this field for 20 years thus having stability.

loans.use: To buy 8 quintales (1 quintal=46 kilos) of corn and firewood.

loans.name: Isabel Reyna

texts.es:
La señora Isabel Reyna V., se dedica a la fabricación de tortillas ella misma las palmea en su casa de habitación donde habita con sus 4 hijos pero ninguno depende  de ella todos son independientes.

Ella lleva ya 36 créditos con ceprodel revolventes cada dos meses los cuales los utiliza para comprar Leña, Maíz, Cal. Doña Isabel V.  ha sido muy responsable con sus obligaciones, siempre ha pagado en tiempo y forma.
texts.en:
Mrs. Isabel Reyna V. makes hand-made tortillas in her home where she lives with her four children although none of them depends on her; they are independent.

She has had 36 loans with Ceprodel that revolve every two months that she uses to buy firewood, corn and lime powder.

Mrs. Isabel V. has been very responsible with her obligations; she has always repaid on time.

loans.use: To buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Julia Saturnina

texts.es:
La señora Julia Saturnina J. Zeledón se dedica a la venta de refrescos ambulantes en el sector de el Bisne es soltera tiene hijos pero ninguno depende ella, todos son independientes.
Ella solicita crédito para comprar productos para su venta ha sido muy responsable con sus pagos, lleva ya 32 créditos con ceprodel.
texts.en:
Mrs. Julia Saturnina J. Zeledón is an itinerant soft drink merchant in El Bisne.  She is single.  She has children but none depend on her; they are all independent.

She asks for funds to buy stock items for her sales.  She has been very responsible with her payments.  She has had 32 loans with Ceprodel.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her sales.

loans.name: Señor De La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
ALCOM SEÑOR DE LA ESPERANZA 

La señora Mila es integrante de la nueva Alcancía Comunal “Señor de la Esperanza” en donde participan 07 personas emprendedora que realizan diversas actividades de comercio y servicios en la zona de Matucana, ella comenta que  una amiga la animo a  participar del programa Prosperidad -  ‘EDAPROSPO’.

Mila con 48 años de edad, juntamente con su pareja (conyugue) se dedican a las ventas de materiales de construcción menores como: arena, cemento, hormigón, etc. lleva 20 años dedicada  a este negocio, la idea del negocio nació debido a la habilidad y experiencia que su  esposo tiene, y también porque es un negocio rentable; así también Mila se dedica a vender comida rápida  o frituras como: salchipollos, hamburguesas ademas agua de manzana y otros antojitos en la puerta de su casa; es así como ellos terminaron de construir  el primer piso de su  vivienda, asi mismo cuenta con una cochera para estacionamientos que hoy en día  lo ha arrendado a una empresa de transporte de la zona alta de matucana. 
Actualmente  no cuenta con ningún ahorro, porque sus ingresos cubren su capital y gastos de su hogar. Mila tiene como meta, formar una pequeña empresa como contratista en la adquisición de maquinarias de voladuras y perforación, para alquilarlas a las empresas mineras de la zona. El reciente préstamo que recibió lo invertirá para comprar algunos materiales de construcción.
texts.en:
LORD OF HOPE COMMUNAL BANK

Mila is a member of the “Señor de la Esperanza” (Lord of Hope) communal bank which has 7 members.  All are enterprising people in different commercial and service activities in the Matucana area.  She comments that a friend encouraged her to participate in the Prosperidad-EDAPROSPO program.

Mila, 48, with her spouse sells building materials and supplies like: sand, cement, concrete, etc.  She has been in this line of work for 20 years.  The idea for the business came from her husband’s ability and experience and also because it’s profitable.  Mila also sells fast food or fried snacks like: salchipollos (fried potatoes with fried chicken) and hamburgers, apple juice and other snacks at her doorstep. This is how they managed to finish building the first floor of their house.  They also have a car port in Matucana’s high zone that they lease to a transportation firm for parking.

She doesn’t have any savings because her earnings cover her capital needs and household expenses.  Mila’s goal is to form a small contracting firm buying demolition and perforation equipment to lease to mining firms in the area.

The loan she got recently will be used to buy some building materials and supplies.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Lucia Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Lucia del Carmen A. F. es comerciante, riega ropa al crédito casa por casa, esta vez solicito crédito para compra de unos medicamentos de su mama ya que está bien señora y solo ella vive con su mama.
Es acompañada tiene una niña de meses, la cual se la mira su mama ha tenido ya 5 créditos y ha pagado en tiempo y forma, es muy responsable con sus pagos
texts.en:
Mrs. Lucia del Carmen A. F. is a saleperson.  She sells clothes on credit by going house to house.  This time she is requesting a loan to buy medicine for her mother since she is elderly and Lucia del Carmen is the only one who lives with her.
She has an infant that her mother cares for.  She has had 5 loans and has paid them on time and correctly. She is very responsible with her payments.

loans.use: To buy medicine

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es: Carmen estudió corte y confección y lleva 26 años dedicada a este oficio  se inicio con este trabajo debido a los problemas familiares , es por ello que hasta hoy en día ella se esmera mucho y apoya a su esposo que trabaja como obrero en diversas actividades y juntos lograron darles la mejor educación a su hijos como también sus alimentos y otras necesidades básicas, Agradece a una querida amiga, quien la ayudó económicamente para adquirir un maquina de coser, desde aquel momento ella pudo comprar sus materiales de trabajo y así fue mejorando sus ingresos, hoy en día sus 59 años de edad, casada y con 07 hijos que ya son mayores e independientes la  apoyan con los gastos de su casa, ella sueña mas adelante comprar una maquina industrial y poner un taller de confección mas amplio y  aprender hacer diseños de modas. Carmen se apoya con el programa prosperidad de Edaprospo pues debe invertir en diversos insumos para poder trabajar, ella se reporta puntual y responsable en sus pagos.
texts.en: Carmen studied dressmaking and has been dedicated to this job for 26 years. She started with this job due to problems in the family which is why nowadays she does her best and supports her husband who works as a worker in diverse jobs. Together they were able to give their children the best education as well as food and other basic necessities. She is thankful for a dear friend who helped her economically with obtaining a sewing machine. From that moment on she was able to buy her materials and began improving her profit. Nowadays at 59 years old, married, and with 7 children who are all independent and who help with house payments, she dreams of buying an industrial sewing machine and open up larger workshop and learn how to design clothes. Carmen finds support in the prosperity program of Edaprospo since she has to invest in diverse supplies to be able to work. She proclaims herself to be punctual and responsible with her payments.

loans.use: The purchase of an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Blanca Ofelia

texts.es:
Blanca T. A., trabaja en su negocio desde las seis de la mañana hasta las tres de la tarde junto con sus hijos y esposo en el sacado de las piedras cantera.
Ha trabajado alrededor de 19 préstamos con ceprodel.
 
El préstamo solicitado es para la compra de una camioneta para el traslado de las piedras canteras, (complemento).
 Tiene cuatro hijos dos de ellos trabajan por cuenta propia y los otros dos trabajan con ella.
texts.en:
Blance T. A. works in her business from 6 a.m. until 3 p.m. with her children and husband in the excavation of quarry stone. She has worked with 19 loans with Cenprodel.

The requested loan is for the purchase of a truck for transporting the quarry rocks. (complement) She has four children two of who work independently and two who work with her.

loans.use: The purchase of a vehicle(COMPLEMENT)

loans.name: Karina Patricia

texts.es: karian Tiene 20 años, ella tiene ya 2 años en el negocio de venta de comida y hamburguesas, tiene el negocio instalado en su domicilio lo cual le permite adquirir una gran ganancia que le sirve para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, por lo que solicita el credito para poder realizarle ampliaciones a su negocio y poder recibir a mayor fluencia de publico, se lo otorga el crédito por contar con buenas referencias y capacida de pago.
texts.en: Karina is 20 years old and has had her business selling food and hamburgers for two years. She set up the business in her home, which allows her to bring in great profits that help her provide her family with a better quality of life. She is requesting the loan to make expansions to her business so it can receive a greater number of people. The loan has been authorized due to her strong references and ability to make payments.

loans.use: Purchase supplies

loans.name: María Esther

texts.es:
María Esther tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera y vive junto a su madre en el fundo San Martín, una zona rural situada a un lado de la carretera que une la ciudad de Chiclayo con el distrito de San José.

Desde hace tres años ella dirige un negocio de venta de comida y bebidas en un ambiente situado en la parte posterior de su domicilio. Con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad ella ayuda a su madre con los gastos familiares. Los clientes son los pobladores del lugar que prefieren su establecimiento debido a la buena sazón con la que prepara los alimentos y al buen trato que brinda al momento de atenderlos.

María está pensando en ampliar su negocio con la compra de más insumos para preparar comida, así como también en la compra de más bebidas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

María es una mujer que siempre da lo mejor de si para sacar a su negocio adelante. Anteriormente ya ha trabajado con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus pagos.
texts.en: María Esther is 22 years old, single and lives with her mother in San Martín, a rural area situated on the side of the highway that connects the city of Chiclayo to the district of San José. For the past three years she has managed a business selling food and beverages out of the back part of her home. She helps her mother with household expenses with the income she earns. Her customers are locals who prefer her establishment because of the good seasonings she uses to prepare her meals and her quality customer service. María is thinking about expanding her business by purchasing more ingredients to make her meals, as well as more beverages. She is requesting a loan of 1000 soles from Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa to help her achieve this objective. María is a woman who always gives her all to make headway for her business. She has previously worked with Edpyme Alternativa and has shown herself to be punctual and responsible with her payments.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients and beverages to expand her business

loans.name: Luis Alfonso Diaz

texts.es:
El señor Luis Alfonso Díaz se dedica a Reparación de Electrodomésticos en su propia casa de habitación, habita en el barrio Guadalupe de la radio somos 1/2c abajo el mismo realiza sus trabajos de reparación.

El señor Alfonso Díaz es casado tiene tres hijos pero ninguno depende de  el todos son independientes, lleva ya 17 créditos  y los solicita para compra de repuestos para realizar sus reparaciones, es muy puntual con sus obligaciones.
texts.en: Luis Alfonso Díaz makes a living repairing household appliances out of his home in Guadalupe barrio. He is married and has three children, all of whom are full grown and independent. He has already received 17 loans and is requesting another to purchase parts in order to make his repairs. He is very punctual with his payments.

loans.use: Purchase parts

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es:
Marcial tiene 51 años de edad, es soltero y vive en el caserío La Zaranda, una zona rural que tiene como principal actividad la agricultura, el lugar pertenece al distrito de Pítipo, provincia de Ferreñafe y se encuentra ubicado a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores agrícolas desde hace mas de veinte años. Actualmente ha sembrado maíz en un terreno de cultivo ubicado cerca a su vivienda. El depende de esta actividad para solventar sus gastos y salir adelante, por ello siempre da lo mejor de si para cuidar su cultivo de modo que se asegure un buena producción.

Marcial desea adquirir algunos fertilizantes y pesticidas para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo, para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

El es una persona muy conocedora de su negocio, siempre trabaja con empeño y responsabilidad. Anteriormente ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus pagos.
texts.en: Marcial is 51years old, single and lives in the hamlet of La Zaranda, a rural agricultural area in the district of Pítipo, province of Ferreñafe, and located 45 minutes from the city of Chiclayo. He has made a living in agriculture for more than 20 years. Currently he has planted corn on a plot of land near his home. He depends on this activity to cover household expenses and make headway, so he always gives his best to take care of his crops and ensure a good production. Marcial wants to acquire some fertilizers and pesticides to better care for his crops, and to achieve that objective he is requesting a loan of 2000 soles from Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa. He is a very savvy businessman who always works hard and responsibly. He has previously received loans from Edpyme Alternativa and has show himself to be responsible with his payments.

loans.use: Purchase fertilizers and pesticides for his corn crops

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca tiene 54 años de edad, es casada y vive junto a su esposo y a sus tres hijos en el caserío Nuevo Yapato del distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que produce principalmente frutas como limón y mango. Se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Piura, perteneciente a la región del mismo nombre, a mas de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Francisca tiene un negocio de venta de comida, ella prepara diversos platos de comida y los ofrece en venta en el mercado de la ciudad de Sullana, ciudad ubicada a media hora de donde vive, ella atiende su negocio todos los dias y debido al tiempo que lleva en el negocio actualmente ya cuenta con un grupo de clientes fidelizados que prefieren su negocio por la buena sazón con la que prepara sus comidas y por el buen trato con el que atiende a sus clientes.

Su esposo se dedica a la venta de pescado y juntos trabajan arduamente para sacar adelante a sus hijos. Francisca está pensando en ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas insumos de tal manera que pueda preparar mas platos de comida y por consiguiente su nivel de ventas aumente. Para realizar su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Francisca es una mujer bastante trabajadora y que siempre vela por el desarrollo de los suyos. Anteriormente ya ha trabajado con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado ser una cliente puntual y responsable.
texts.en: Francisca is 54 years old, married and lives with her husband and their three children in the hamlet of Nuevo Yapato, district of Tambogrande, an agricultural area that mainly produces lemons and mango. It is in the province of Piura, in the region of the same name, and is more than three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region. Francisca has a business selling food. She prepares diverse meals and sells them at the market in the city of Sullana, located a half hour from where she lives. She tends to her customers every day, and thanks to the time she has spent with the business she now has a group of loyal customers who prefer her business because of its tasty seasonings and her good customer service. Her husband makes a living as a fisherman, and together they work hard to make headway for their children. Francisca is thinking about expanding her business by buying more ingredients that will allow her to prepare more meals and thus increase her sales. In order to achieve this objective she is requesting a loan of 2000 soles from Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa. Francisca is a hard-working woman who is always looking out for her family. She has previously worked with Edpyme Alternativa and has shown herself to be punctual and responsible.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients to expand business selling food in the market.

loans.name: Luis Francisco

texts.es:
Luis Francisco M., trabaja como ayudante en la dirección de administración del centro de insumos para la salud. 

El préstamo solicitado es para la compra de Materiales de construcción para reparar el techo de su casa de habitación.
Tiene dos hijos y estos se encuentran en edad escolar.
Ha tabajado dos prestamos con ceprodel y estos han sido para el mejoramiento de su casa de habitación.
texts.en: Luis works as an administration assistant at a health products center. He is requesting the loan to purchase construction material to repair the roof on his home. He has two school-age children. He has had two loans with Kiva partner Ceprodel, and these have helped him make improvements on his home.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
Marisol tiene 32 años de edad, es soltera y vive junto a sus padres en el sector Buenos Aires del distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que produce principalmente limón y mango, pertenece a la provincia de Piura y se encuentra ubicada en la región del mismo nombre, a más de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella es hija de un matrimonio de agricultores y tratando de mantener una actividad que les brinde ingresos permanentes con los cuales puedan solventar sus gastos personales intaló hace mas de un año en su vivienda una bodega en la que ofrece a sus clientes todo tipo de productos de consumo diario. El negocio cuenta con buena acogida ya que ella lo sabe administrar muy bien, los productos que ofrece son de buena calidad y siempre atiende a sus clientes con un trato amable.

Marisol desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos de modo que pueda ampliar sus ventas y su nivel de ingresos, para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Ella es una joven bastante responsable y muy entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marisol is 32 years old, single, and lives with her parents in the Buenos Aires section of the Tambogrande district.  This is an agricultural area that produces primarily lemons and mangoes, and belongs to the Piura province, more than 3½ hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

She is the daughter of a marriage of farmers.  In an effort to generate income for her personal expenses, she started a general store more than a year ago in the home where she offers a variety of products.  The business has been well received because she is a good manager.  She stocks good quality products and is always friendly when tending to her customers.

Marisol would like to expand her business by purchasing more products, as this will allow her to increase her sales and therefore generate more income.  To meet this objective, she has decided to request her first loan of 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

She is a responsible young woman, who is very committed to her family.  Her greatest wish is to continue to grow as an entrepreneur and to provide a higher standard of living for her family.

loans.use: To purchase basic necessities and groceries to expand her store.

loans.name: Ana Liza

texts.en:
Ana Liza M. is from the village of Dinas, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 37 years old, married, and has three school-aged children. To make a living, she raises pigs for sale. She has been engaged in her business for over twelve years and earns approximately $38 a month for these activities.

In 2007, Ana Liza joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 4,000 PHP from GDMPC. 

Ana Liza is requesting a new loan of 3,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional feed for the pigs. This will be her 6th loan from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three unit offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for the pigs

loans.name: María Del Pilar

texts.es:
María del Pilar es una madre de familia de 32 años de edad, que vive junto a su esposo y a sus cuatro hijos en el sector San Martín del distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que produce principalmente frutas como limón y mango. Se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Piura, perteneciente a la región del mismo nombre, a mas de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

María del Pilar se dedica a la venta de comida, ella prepara diversos platos de comida y los ofrece en venta tres veces por semana en un puesto ubicado frente a la puerta principal del mercado de su distrito, gracias al tiempo que lleva en el negocio actualmente ya cuenta con un grupo de clientes fidelizados que prefieren su negocio por la buena sazón con la que prepara sus comidas y por el buen trato con el que los atiende.

Los ingresos que ella percibe los utiliza para ayudar a su esposo a sacar adelante a sus hijos. María está pensando en ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas insumos de tal manera que pueda preparar mas platos de comida y por consiguiente su nivel de ventas aumente. Para realizar su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

María es una mujer bastante trabajadora y que siempre vela por el desarrollo de los suyos. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para poder instalar un restaurante.
texts.en:
Maria del Pilar is a 32 year old mom that lives with her husband and four children in San Martin sector of the Tambogrande district, an agricultural area that mainly produces limes and mangoes.  It is located in the province of Piura which belongs to the region of the same name, more than three and a half hours away from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque.

María del Pilar sells food, she prepares different dishes and offers them for sale three times a week in a stand located across the main entrance of the district market, thanks to the time she has been in business she currently has a group of loyal clients that prefer her business because of the great flavor of well seasoned food and the good service she provides.

The income that she gets is used to help her husband and get her kids ahead.  Maria is considering expanding her business by buying more ingredients and this way make more dishes and increase her sales.  To achieve this objective she thought it would be convenient to request a loan of 1000 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Maria is a very hardworking woman and she always looks after the development of her people.  Her biggest dream is to grow as an entrepreneur and be able to open a restaurant.

loans.use: Buy ingredients for food sales

loans.name: Mercedes Lisseth

texts.es:
La señora Mercedes Lissethe Córdoba Martínez se dedica a comercio tiene una pequeña pulpería en su casa de habitación, es casada tiene una niña de 02 años , su esposo trabaja en una carnicería.
Esta vez ella solicito crédito para mejorar su vivienda ya que tenía paredes de tabla, y necesitaba cambiar el zinc, ha tenido 24 créditos con ceprodel los cuales ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Mercedes Lissethe Córdoba Martínez has a small grocery store in her house.  She is married and has a two year old daughter.  Her husband works in a butcher’s shop.

This time she is requesting a loan to improve her house.  She had walls made of planks, and she needed to change the zinc.  She has had 24 loans with Ceprodel, and she has demonstrated herself to be a very responsible person with her payments.

loans.use: To buy zinc, wood, and nails

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena U. R. tiene su negocio de venta de ropa y calzado. Tiene más de 10 años en este tipo de actividad, es madre de familia de tres hijos, ella trabaja junto con su esposo donde ha venido sacando a delante el negocio.
Ellos trabajan de 7 de la mañana hasta las cinco de la tarde en el mercado oriental de Managua, el préstamo solicitado es para la compra de ropa y calzado para su negocio.
Es su primer préstamo con la institución .
texts.en:
Magdalena U. R. has a business selling clothes and footwear.  She has been doing this type of work for over ten years.  She has three children.  

She works with her husband, and they have been getting the business ahead.  They work at the Mercado Oriental in Managua from seven in the morning until five in the afternoon. 

The requested loan is to buy clothes and footwear for her business.  This is her first loan with the institution.

loans.use: To buy clothes and footwear

loans.name: Nativida Julia

texts.es: La Señora Natividad López se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas elaboradas por ella misma con alta calidad por lo que los clientes le llegan a visitar para la compra de estas deliciosas tortillas. Actualmente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de la materia prima para elaborar dichas tortillas y de esta forma satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y así continuar llevando el sustento a su casa de habitación que tanto dependen de ella.
texts.en: Mrs. Natividad Julia López A. makes tortillas in her home in the neighborhood of Camilo Ortega. Her children are not under her care, but they help her to roll the tortillas. Mrs. Natividad has already had 29 credits, which she has repaid on time and in full.

loans.use: To buy raw materials for tortillas

loans.name: Rosa Veneranda

texts.es: La señora Rosa Veneranda R. es comerciante posee un tramo en el sector del Bisne de Chinelas es madre soltera con dos hijos ambos en edad escolares, Ella adquiere créditos revolventes cada dos meses, los cuales los paga en tiempo y forma, solicita crédito para incrementar su inventario de mercadería y poder ofrecer mejor variedad a  sus clientes y asi obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en: Ms. Rosa Veneranda R. is a trader: she owns a shop located in the Bisne’s market slippers section. She is a single mother of two children, both attending school. Every two months she is granted revolving loans that she repays in full and in time. The loan she is requesting will be used to supply her stock, in order to offer a wider variety of products to her customers and consequently increase her earnings.

loans.use: To buy core products to supply her stock.

loans.name: Javier De Jesus

texts.es:
Javier de Jesús D. M. tiene su negocio de venta de repuesto y accesorio para bicicletas. Tiene mas de 10 años en este tipo de actividad, es padre de familia de dos hijos, el trabaja junto con su esposa donde ha venido sacando a delante el negocio.
Ellos trabajan de 8 de la mañana hasta las cinco de la tarde, el préstamo solicitado es para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.
Ha trabajado alrededor de ocho prestamos y todos estos han sido para compra de mercadería de su negocio.
texts.en:
Javier de Jesús D. M. owns a shop where he sells bicycle spare parts and accessories. He has been engaging in this activity for more than 10 years. A family man with two children, he works together with his wife, with whom he has succeeded in getting the shop off the ground.
Their working hours are from 8 am to 5 pm; the loan he is requesting will be used to buy products for his shop. 
He has already received eight loans, all of which have been used to buy products for his activity.

loans.use: To buy bicycle spare parts and accessories to sell.

loans.name: Lisseth Ana

texts.es: Lisseth Tiene 21 años, ella tiene ya 2 años en el negocio de venta de productos de belleza, lo cual le permite adquirir una gran ganancia que le sirve para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, por lo que solicita el credito para poder compra mas cantidad de productos de belleza, se lo otorga el crédito por contar con buenas referencias y capacida de pago.
texts.en:
Lisseth is 21 years old and has already been in the business of selling beauty products for two years.  This allows her to earn the majority of the income she needs to provide her family with a better quality of life.  She is requesting this loan so that she can buy more beauty products.

In order to receive this loan, Lisseth has good references and the ability to pay.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena M. is from the village of Dinas, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 32 years old, married, and has three school-aged children. To make a living, she operates a motorcycle transport service. Lorena is just starting this business.

In 2008, Lorena joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5,000 PHP from GDMPC. 

Lorena is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase tires and other accessories. This will be her 4th loan from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three unit offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle tires and other accessories

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth B. is from the village of Dinas, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 32 years old, married, and has two school-aged children. To make a living, she operates tricycle transport services. She has been engaged in her business for over a year and earns approximately $150 a month for these activities.

In 2010, Elizabeth joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 12,000 PHP which will be used to purchase tires and other accessories. This will be her 1st loan from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units office covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase tires and other accessories

loans.name: Froiphe

texts.en:
Froiphe P. is from the village of Cagay-anon, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 19 years old. Froiphe is single. To make a living Froiphe owns and operates a business venture in the services sector operating transportation services. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from operating tricycle transport services. Froiphe has been engaged in her business for over two years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2010 Froiphe joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Froiphe is requesting a new loan of 10000 PHP which will be used to purchase tires and other accessories. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Froiphe from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business. 


About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase tires and other accessories

loans.name: Neli Piedad

texts.es: Neli Piedad P. R. es una señora de 60 años de edad y reside en el Barrio Calvario en la comunidad de Manto, San Francisco de  la Paz. Inició hace 8 años vendiendo piedra, grava y arena, y ahora tiene un negocio de fabricación de bloques de cemento. Adquirió su conocimiento en una bloquera ya que ella trabajaba allí como despachadora, luego de un tiempo decidió construir su casa y se dio cuenta de que comprar los bloques era muy costoso, así que adquirió una maquina compactadora para la elaboración de los mismos y la instaló en el patio de su casa. Actualmente cuatro personas trabajan para ella con un horario de 5:00 am a  12:00 pm y también en la tarde cuando es necesario. Solicita el préstamo para comprar cemento, arena y otros materiales para poder construir una champa en su patio y así proteger un poco a sus trabajadores del intenso sol y a veces lluvias. Con el apoyo del préstamo ella podrá seguir cubriendo sus gastos de manutención porque vive sola y no tiene la ayuda de nadie más. Su meta es comprar una vibradora para hacer los bloques más rápido y en mayor cantidad. Es su segundo ciclo en  FAMA y espera seguir pagando puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Neli Piedad P. R. is a 60 year old woman who resides in the neighborhood of Calvario in the community of Manto, San Francisco de la Paz. Eight years ago she began selling stone, gravel, and sand. Now she has a business making cement blocks. She acquired the knowledge of how to make cement blocks while working as a dispatcher. After a period of time, she decided to build a house and realized that buying blocks was very expensive. Neli acquired a compacting machine for making the blocks she needed to install a patio in her yard. She currently has four employees who work for her between the hours of 5am and 12pm. They also work in the afternoons when necessary.

Neli is requesting a loan to buy cement, sand, and other materials to build a shed in her yard to protect her employees from the intense sun and the occasional rains. With the help of this loan, she will able to continue covering her living expenses because she lives alone and does not receive assistance from anyone else. Her goal is to buy a vibrating machine to help her produce blocks faster and in large quantities. This is the second loan she has received from FAMA OPDF and she hopes to continue making her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to build a shed to protect her employees

loans.name: Gumercindo

texts.es: Gumercindo Macías S. es un comerciante y agricultor de 50 años de edad y junto a su esposa y sus seis hijos reside en la comunidad de Las Guacamayas, Manto, Olancho.  Gumercindo se dedica a la agricultura desde hace mucho tiempo atrás y un día su esposa le sugirió que con las ganancias que él estaba obteniendo debían instalar una pequeña pulpería en su casa de habitación y así tener una entrada de dinero más para poder brindarles a sus hijos todo lo básico y necesario para su sostenimiento. Ahora él tiene su pulpería y cuando tiene que ir a revisar su cultivo, su esposa o sus hijos le ayudan a atenderla. El préstamo lo solicita para comprar una mayor y variada cantidad de productos de abarrotería y así mantener bien surtida su pulpería. Con el apoyo de este préstamo él podrá seguir apoyando a sus hijos para que sigan estudiando y seguir teniendo una fuente de ingreso. Es su segundo ciclo en  FAMA y espera seguir pagando puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Gumercindo Macías S. is a 50-year-old merchant and farmer. He lives with his wife and their six children in the community of Las Guacamayas (the Scarlet Macaw) in Manto, Olancho.

Gumercindo had been farming for a long time when one day his wife suggested that he use his profits to set up a small store in their home. This would provide an additional source of income and help provide all their children’s basic and necessary needs. Now he has his store and when he needs to tend to his crops, his wife and children help him take care of it.

The loan request will be used to buy a larger and more varied quantity of grocery products to keep the store well stocked. The support of this loan will enable him to continue supporting the children in their studies and still have a source of income. This is his second lending cycle with FAMA and he expects to continue making regular repayments.

loans.use: Comprar abarroteria en general

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal La Esperanza está integrado por diez socios, los cuales realizan diferentes actividades económicas en la comunidad de Dulce Nombre de Culmi, Catacamas. El coordinador del banco es Santos Camilo B.. Él es carpintero, tiene 50 años de edad, es casado y tiene siete hijos.  Santos aprendió el oficio de la carpintería como ayudante en un taller de un amigo y ahora él tiene su propio taller. Una de las dificultades que enfrenta es que obtener un permiso de explotación de madera es muy embarazoso y por eso sus trabajos son muy pocos y no necesita empleados. Santos está solicitando el préstamo para comprar materiales como: madera, lijas, pegamento, barniz, sellador, etc. y así elaborar unos muebles que tiene ya encargados. A Santos le encanta su oficio y por eso espera que con el apoyo de este préstamo pueda seguir operando su taller. Su meta es crecer económicamente para poder darle a su familia todo lo básico y necesario para su sostenimiento diario. Los demás integrantes del banco solicitan el préstamo para diferentes actividades económicas como la cría y destazo de cerdos y vacas, venta de ropa de segunda mano, zapatos, rosquillas, productos de abarrotería.
texts.en:
La Esperanza community bank is composed of ten members, who carry out various economic activities in the community of Dulce Nombre de Culmi, in Catacamas. The bank coordinator is Santos Camilo B.. He is a 50-year-old carpenter, married with seven children. Santos learned the woodworking craft as an assistant in a friend’s workshop and now has his own workshop.

One difficulty he faces is that obtaining a permit to exploit timber is very difficult; therefore his production is limited and requires no employees. Santos is seeking a loan to buy materials such as wood, sandpaper, glue, varnish, sealer, etc. and thus produce furniture that has already been ordered. Santos loves his job and he hopes that the support of this loan will allow him to continue operating his workshop.

His goal is to grow economically to provide his family with all the basic necessities for daily living. The other members of the community bank are seeking a loan for different economic activities such as farming and butchering of pigs and cows, selling second-hand clothes, shoes, donuts, and grocery products.

loans.use: Comprar madera, pegamento, tornillos, barniz, sellador, etc
