loans.use: To purchase raw materials

loans.name: Sopp Serigne Bara Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité SOPP SERIGNE BARA est créé depuis 4 ans et demi à l'inauguration du Banc Villageois de Keur Moussa dont il fait partie. Il est composé de 10 membres qui sont tous issus du même quartier.

Madame Kahdy G. tout à fait à gauche de la photo et levant la main est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de trente six ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Elle a aussi la charge deux autres enfants qui lui sont confiés par des proches.

Elle fait du petit commerce d'œufs. Elle achète sa marchandise chez des aviculteurs pour revendre dans les marchés. Elle pratique cette activité depuis sept ans. 

Avec son nouveau crédit de 120.000 francs CFA elle va acheter des œufs en quantité afin de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle et de réaliser plus de bénéfices. 

Son objectif est de subvenir à ses besoins, participer à la nourriture de la famille et d'équiper sa maison en meubles.
texts.en:
The SOPP SERIGNE BARA solidarity group was created four and a half years ago at the inauguration of the Banc Villageois of Keur Moussa, to which the group belongs. It is composed of ten members, all from the same neighborhood.

Mrs. Kahdy G. is the head of the group. She appears at the far left of the photo with her hand raised. She is 36 years old, married, and has four children. She also has two other children entrusted in her care by relatives.

Mrs. G. sells eggs. She buys her stocks from poultry farmers for resale at the markets. She has been working in this trade for seven years.

With her new loan of 120,000FCFA, she will buy a large supply of eggs to better serve her customers and increase her profits.

Her goal is to support herself, help feed the family and furnish her home.

loans.use: To buy eggs

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more soap, oil, milk, onions, tomatoes, sugar, tea, butter, hair grease, etc.

loans.name: Albino Estevao

texts.pt:
Albino Estevão C. nasceu no Distrito de Chokwe, Província de Gaza, sul de Moçambique, pai de 2 filhos menores ainda não vão a escola. Não estudou devido a guerra de desestabilização. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 

Saiu de Gaza para Maputo com os seus pais em 1984 que vinha a procura de emprego. Trabalha como carregador de caixas numa firma ha mais de 6 anos, tem um salario de 2.500.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda consegue poupar algum de vez enquanto através de xitique (sistema tradicional de poupança rotativa).

Nunca teve empréstimo em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de colegas que já são clientes desta instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo no valor de 8.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, arames, barrotes, pedra, areia e outros) para dar continuidade com a construção da sua residência.

Esta confiante que vai pagar sem nenhum problema e pedir um novo empréstimo para concluir sua casa.
texts.en:
Albino Estevão C. was born in the Chokwe district in the Gaza province in the south of Mozambique. He is the father of 2 young children who don't yet attend school. He did not go to school himself because of a destabilizing war. He lives in his own home with his family and he doesn't support anyone else.

He left Gaza for Maputo in 1984 with his parents, who came to find work. He has worked as a porter of boxes in a firm for more than 6 years. He makes 2,500MT per month, which he applies to his household expenses and he saves some occasionally through xitique (a traditional system of rotating savings).

He has never taken out a loan from another bank. He learned about Hluvuku through his colleagues who were already clients of the institution. This is his first loan for 8,000MT, which he will use to purchase construction materials (cement, wire, beams, stone, sand, etc.) to continue construction on his home.

He is confidant that he can make his repayments without any problems and seek additional loans to finish his home.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials (cement, wire, beams, stone, sand, etc.)

loans.name: Miatta Group

texts.en:
Miatta S., who is holding the sign, is the leader of this group of five borrowers called Miatta Group. She is 41 years old, married, and has nine children who are between the ages of 10 and 25 years. She was not able to attend school due to financial constraints. 

For 13 years, she has been selling cutlasses, knives, nails, shovels, hammers, hinges, door locks and more in Redlight Market on the outskirts of Monrovia, Liberia. She plans to use her 15,000 Liberian Dollars portion of this 66,000 Liberian Dollars group loan to buy more cutlasses, knives, nails, shovels, hammers, hinges, door locks, etc. 

She describes herself as a determined woman whose goals are to improve her business and build a house.

loans.use: To buy more cutlasses, knives, nails, shovels, hammers, hinges, door locks, etc.

loans.name: Molmol

texts.en:
Molmol T.  lives in Osh city, south of Kyrgyzstan. She is 46, married, and has three children. Molmol graduated from medical college as a nurse and devoted 15 years of practical experience to helping her patients to overcome their diseases. 

In 1995, when Molmol was expecting a baby, her husband lost his job. Those times became a period of living in the pinch of poverty for her family. But Molmol didn’t give up and decided to start her own business reselling linens, fabrics and tablecloths, using her initial capital of 10,000 KGS.

In spite of many the highs and lows in her activity, Molmol managed to broaden her business by purchasing two small shops and achieved success. These activities led her to obtain loans from “Bai Tushum and Partners”, which were repaid without any delays. Molmol’s husband, who was infected by her enthusiasm, became the main helper and strong supporter in the business. 

But in June 2010, when violent clashes caused by deposed the political regime broke out in Osh, Molmol lost her business. Her shops were robbed and looted. However, Molmol  is ready to resume her lost business and continue to work. For this reason, Molmol is applying for a loan of 135,000 KGS, which she needs to restart her activity. She plans to purchase home products for resale at the local market. With the revenue from this loan, Molmol plans to give a good education to her daughter, because she believes that educated youth can move their motherland forward. 

Bai-Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target the especially vulnerable population. Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading Microfinance Institutions in Kyrgyzstan. As a reliable financial partner, Bai-Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of microfinance services in rural and urban areas that lead to increased employment and meet the interests of its clients and investors.

loans.use: to purchase goods for resale

loans.name: Fatima Juliao

texts.pt:
Fátima Julião N. nasceu no Distrito de Inhassoro, Província de Inhambane, sul de Moçambique, mãe de 2 filhos que freqüentam a escola. Fez somente 5ª classe não continuo devido a dificuldades financeiras pelos pais. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 

Saiu de Inhassoro para Maputo com o seu esposo. Tem um negócio próprio de venda de roupa nova e usada ha mais de 10 anos, não possui nenhum empregado e consegue um rendimento de cerca de 4.000.00 a 5.000.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda consegue poupar algum no xitique semanal (sistema tradicional de poupança rotativa).

Ja teve empréstimo em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu quinto empréstimo no valor de 10.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar fardos de roupa para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 5.000.00mt, 7.000.00mt,9.000.00mt e 10.000.00mt e foi para a mesma actividade.

Esta confiante que vai pagar sem nenhum problema e pedir um novo empréstimo para continuar com a melhoria de seu negocio.
texts.en:
Fátima Julião N. was born in the District of Inhassoro, Province of Inhambane in the south of Mozambique.  She is the mother of two children who attend school.  She only finished fifth grade, and didn't continue due to her parents' financial difficulties.  She lives in her own house with her family and has no other dependents.

She left Inhassoro for Maputo with her husband.  She has had her own business selling new and used clothing for more than ten years; she has no employees and manages to earn an income of about 4,000 to 5,000 MT per month, which she uses for household expenses and still manages to set some aside every week in the xitique (traditional rotational savings system).

Fátima has already had loans from other banks.  She got to know about Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution.  This is her fifth loan — at a value of 10,000 MT — with which she plans to purchase bundles of clothing to increase the quantity of her merchandise.  The previous loans were for 5,000 MT, 7,000 MT, 9,000 MT, and 10,000 MT, and were used for the same purpose.

She is confident that she will repay without any problem and will ask for a new loan in order to continue with the improvement of her business.

loans.use: purchase bundles of clothing

loans.name: Floriano Bungano

texts.pt:
Floriano Bungano V. nasceu na cidade de Inhambane, Província de mesmo, sul de Moçambique, casada. Fez somente 3ª classe não continuou devido a falta de condições financeiras pelos pais. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

Saiu de Inhambane para Maputo na companhia do seu esposo, a procura de melhores condições de vida. Tem um negócio próprio ha mais de 20 anos, consegue um rendimento de cerca de 4.000.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda consegue poupar algum valor na sua conta bancaria.

Nunca teve empréstimo em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de colegas que também são clientes desta instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo no valor de 10.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar produtos (temperos, caldos, arroz, farinha, plásticos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade do seu produto.

Esta confiante que vai pagar sem nenhum problema e pedir um novo empréstimo para melhorar ainda mais o seu negocio.
texts.en:
Floriano Bungano V. was born in the city of Inhambane, province of the same name, in the south of Mozambique.  She is married.  She only finished third grade and did not continue due to her parents' financial conditions.  She lives in her own house with her family and has no other dependents.

She left Inhambane for Maputo in the company of her husband in search of better living conditions.  She has had her own business for more than 20 years and manages to bring in an income of about 4,000 MT per month, which she uses for household expenses and still manages to set some aside in her bank account.

She has never had a loan in another bank.  She got to know about Hluvuku through colleagues who are also clients of this institution.  This is her first loan — at a value of 10,000 MT — with which she intends to purchase products (seasonings, soups, rice, flour, plastic ware, and other items) in order to increase the quantity of her merchandise.

She is confident that she will repay without any problem and will ask for a new loan to improve her business even further.

loans.use: purchase of products (seasonings, soups, rice, flour, plastic ware, and other items)

loans.name: Liston  Kimani

texts.en:
Liston Kimani is 28 years old, a single and hardworking young man, who runs a poultry business in Uthiru, just few kilometers from Nairobi city centre. He supplies eggs to retail kiosks in the neighborhood estates and he earns a monthly profit Kshs.19,800. Additional family income comes through planting of "sukuma wiki" (kale)  which he sells to his neighbors. He has been in this business for one year and three months.

Liston has no history with any other MFI, and he is applying for his first loan of Kshs.20,000 after being introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer. He intends to use this loan to buy  layer chicks  for more eggs to sell later.

In future Liston plans to venture into rearing broilers and pigs to be able meet the demand for meat in the estate as this is a very good business that generates good income.

loans.use: To buy layer chicks for more eggs for sale later

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more 'lappas'

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more bags of used clothes

loans.name: Yosein Sander

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES UNIDAS”; este banco está situado en el distrito de San Sebastian en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio  es el Sr. Sander; El socio tiene 17 años de edad;  él es soltero  y viene desde hace 2 años trabajando como taxista,  el socio tiene un automóvil que presta servicios de taxi, el termino de pagar sus letras y ya es su auto propio y ahora requiere el dinero para repintar su carro, debido a que como es un carro de segunda mano necesita algunos pequeños acabados, ahora que ya pago sus letras y el carro le pertenece y no debe una sola letra el quiere ponerlo casi como nuevo,  el socio cumplira la mayoría de edad en el mes de enero del año que viene el  socio tiene el aval de su hermano mayor dentro del banco comunal. El socio solicita el préstamo para repintar su unidad de taxi.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The partner is a member of the “MUJERES UNIDAS” ("United Women") loan group, based in the district of San Sebastian in the Cusco province, department of Cusco.

Sander is 17 years old and single. He has been working as a taxi driver for two years. He owns a car that he uses to provide taxi services. He has finished paying for it so it is fully his. He now needs money to repaint it, because as a second hand vechicle it requires a few final touches. Now that it's his, he wants to make it look as good as new. The partner will turn 18 in January next year. He has his brother's backing within the loan group. Sander is requesting the loan to repaint his taxi cab. 

The partner is grateful for the loan, values it highly, and is committed to repaying it in the terms agreed.

loans.use: The partner requests the loan to repaint his taxi cab.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES UNIDAS”; este banco está situado en el distrito de San Sebastian en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sonia;  La socia tiene  47 años de edad;  ella es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos,  La socia se dedica a confeccionar diferentes trajes para damas, caballeros y niños La socia trabaja desde hace 7 años haciendo corte y confección en su casa propia. La socia necesita comprar telas, hilos y botones.  La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería para elaborar trajes de vestir. 

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “MUJERES UNIDAS”. This bank is located in the district of San Sebastian in the province and department of Cuzco.

The member is Sonia and she is 47 years old. She is a single mother of 2 children. She makes different clothing for men, women and children. She has worked for 7 years cutting and sewing clothes in her house. She needs to buy fabric, thread and buttons. She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise to make clothing.  

The member is thankful for and values the loan in this way and is committed to making the payments according tho the established schedule.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise to make clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more 'lappas'

loans.name: Coralitos Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Coralitos y está integrado por 10 clientas, en él se encuentra L. señora Lidia S. N. D. 49 años D. edad, quien cuenta con una miscelánea desD. hace 6 años, tiene 4 hijos y el menor D. ellos depenD. económicamente D. elL.. L. señora nos comenta que hace tiempo empezó vendiendo elotes con sus conocidas y familiares, posteriormente pudo adquirir un carrito para L. venta D. su producto, ya que, su domicilio se encuentra cerca D. L. central D. abastos D. L. ciudad D. Toluca, poco a poco su negocio fue creciendo, con los ahorros que pudo juntar durante mucho tiempo decidió emprender un negocio con su familia y así comenzó L. historia D. éxito D. L. clienta. A pesar D. tener “Labio Leporino” y ser victima D. burlas en su comunidad, ha sabido salir adelante y apoyar a su familia, su máxima ilusión siempre ha sido que su hijo menor D. nombre Juan Pablo, quien cuenta con 11 años D. edad y quien cursa L. primaria sea Licenciado, ya que con ese logro valdrá L. pena tanto esfuerzo y sacrificio, los crédito que L. institución le otorgo le han servido para desarrollar su negocio y con ello procurar una mejor calidad D. vida para elL. y su familia, con los próximos créditos que reciba desea trasladar su negocio a otro lugar y con ello tener mayor ganancia.
texts.en: This group is called Coralitos and is maD. up of 10 clients. Mrs.Lidia S. N. is in it. She is 49 years old and has had a variety store for 6 years. She has 4 children and the youngest is financially dependent on her. She tells us that some time ago she began to sell sweetcorn to her acquaintances and relatives. Later she was able to acquire a cart to sell her product, since her residenc is close to the central market in the city of Toluca. Little by little her business grew. With the savings she was able to amass over a long time she decided to start a business with her family and thus began the client's sucess story. Despite having a "harelip" and being a victim of teasing in her community, she has been able to get ahead. With her family's help, her greatest dream has always been for her youngest son, Juan Pablo, who is in elementary school, to be an attorney. With that achievement all of her hard work and sacrifice will have been worth it. The loans that the institution has given her have been to develop her business and with it obtain a better quality of life for her and her family. With the next loans she receives she wants to move her business to a different place and with it obtain more profit.

loans.use: To move her business and have better sales

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Violet

texts.en: This Kiva borrower is a 38-year-old woman. She is the single mother of a 17-year-old daughter with whom she lives in a rented house. Her name is Violet. Violet is a civil servant and possesses a dream of seeing her daughter graduate from college. As for most parents, school fees are hard to come by thus a need for an extra push through accessing credit. This is her first loan from HOFOKAM and she intends to use the loan proceeds to pay school fees for her daughter.

loans.use: Paying school fees for her daughter

loans.name: Mirna Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora S. A. actualmente tiene un negocio de venta de ropa ubicado en el Mercado Municipal de Masaya, en el que ya tiene quince años de tenerla, con este negocio logra mantener a su familia, ella visit alas oficinas de CEPRODEL  a solicitar un crédito para la compra de sandalias, zapatos de colegio de varón, sandalia de tacón, sandalia baja, zapato bajo de mujer, blusas bordadas y cajuela alta.
texts.en: S. A. supports her family through her business, located in the Masaya city market, where she sells clothing and has been doing so for 15 years.  She has approached the CEPRODEL offices to request a loan so that she can buy sandals, boys’ school shoes, heeled sandals, flat sandals, ladies’ flats, embroidered blouses, and trunks.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en: Christopher is a twenty-seven-year-old man, married with two children and living in a temporary house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He farms lemon grass which has enabled him to maintain a good standard of living. However, Christopher is facing a challenge of prolonged drought which sometimes affects his periodic harvest. His business dream is to have spread-out pieces of land with lemon grass. Christopher needs the loan to clear land and pay for labor as he plants his lemon grass on one acre.

loans.use: Clearing land and paying for labor as he plants lemon grass on one acre

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Guadalupe L. ya tiene muchos años dedicándose a la comercialización de ropa y calzado en la zona de Honduras y Costa Rica, ella prácticamente es sola y con su negocio logra estabilizarse económicamente. Esta señora le está solicitando a CEPRODEL financiamiento para la compra de sandalias sintéticas y sillas abuelitas, ya que quiere aprovechar la temporada y algunos encargos extras que le han hecho sus clientes en esos lugares.
texts.en: Guadalupe L. has been selling shoes and clothing for many years in Honduras and Costa Rica.  She is practically alone and tries to stabilize her financial situation through her business.  She is asking for this loan through CEPRODEL to buy synthetic sandals and rocking chairs to take advantage of the season and fill some requests that she has had from her customers in these areas.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Augustine

texts.en:
Augustine is a forty-year-old man, married and very hard-working. He is the head of eight family members living in a self-owned permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His desire is to see his children attain higher level education qualifications in reputable institutions.

 Augustine has been in the lumber business and running a retail shop for sixteen years now and with such vast experience, he has been able to increase his capital from five hundred shillings to three million a year currently. His business dream is to have increased returns from his projects. Augustine intends to use the loan to purchase trees for timber making and selling.

loans.use: Purchasing trees for timber making and selling

loans.name: Ninoska Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora L. R. es trabajadora de la Administración de Renta, ubicado en el Departamento de Masaya desde hace dos años, desempeñándose como Auditora, con este salario que devenga sufraga los gastos de su menor hijo que esta en edad escolar, ella le está solicitando a CEPRODEL un crédito para realizar unos pagos de gastos personales que hizo y no descapitalizarse en su economía familiar.
texts.en: Mrs. L. R. has been working for two years as an auditor in the Rents Administration, located in the Masaya department.  She uses her salary to pay for her school-aged son's expenses.  She is asking for this loan through CEPRODEL to pay some personal expenses and not have to go into debt in other ways.

loans.use: Personal Expenses

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a forty-seven-year-old man, married with seven children, living in his own permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His dream is to educate his children and also have sustainable income for the family. 

Vincent has been in farming for twenty years and has seen noteworthy achievements in his investments, for example, he has been able to buy land and enlarge his house amidst the challenge of fluctuating prices .Vincent needs the loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: Paying school fees for his children

loans.name: Levi

texts.en: Levi is a forty-year-old man, married to a teacher and blessed with four children. He lives in Fort Portal, Uganda and has a desire to have increased income for his family. For two years now, Levi has been operating a retail shop and has been registering tremendous improvement in profits. His business dream is to sell in bulk. This is his first loan from HOFOKAM and he intends to use the loan proceeds to buy a mill to grind groundnuts for sale at his shop.

loans.use: Buying a mill to grind groundnuts to sell at his shop

loans.name: Clariza Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora S. C. anteriormente tenía venta de comida a parte de un taxi que también ella posee y que lo anda su hijo, ella dejo de hacer momentáneamente la comida debido a la situación económica que esta dura y no le resulta por eso ahorita ella está invirtiendo mas en el taxi, con esto logra mantenerse ella y un hijo que tiene que es el que le ayuda, solicita un crédito con CEPRODEL para la compra de llantas y parches para el taxi y de esta forma no perder el único sustento que tiene.
texts.en: Mrs. S. C. used to sell food.  She also owns a taxi that her son drives.  She has temporarily stopped selling food because of the economic situation, which makes it difficult and she is not making sales, so for the time being she is investing more into her taxi.  This way she is able to support herself and her son, who helps her.  She is asking for this loan through CEPRODEL so that she can buy tires and patches for the taxi, so that she will not lose her only means of support.

loans.use: Vehicle repair and maintenance

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Paying school fees for her children

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge, es soltero, hombre de buen carácter y muy pasivo, vive en la casa de su madre.Desde muy joven trabajaba como chofer del carro de su hermano, y con el apoyo de él compro su carro. Hoy en día trabaja arduamente desde muy temprano hasta altas horas de la noche, brindando servicio de taxi a todos los transeúntes de la calle, es así que viene pagando  las letras de su carro y hasta ahora le va muy bien, por ello, las veces que su hermano le pide favor no duda en dársela. Lo que más le gusta de su oficio, es servir a la gente oportunamente y a veces le piden realizar carreras a lugares muy lejanos, siempre y cuando sea algún conocido. En adelante, aspira tener su propia empresa de servicio de taxi en su distrito. Es su quinceavo crédito con MFP, por lo que se ha comprometido en pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, considerando éste crédito muy útil para el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de otras llantas y en el mantenimiento técnico. 







Es su quinceavo crédito con MFP, por lo que se ha comprometido en pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, considerando éste crédito muy útil para el progreso de su negocio.
Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de otras llantas y en el mantenimiento técnico.
texts.en:
Jorge is a single man of good character. He is very peaceful and lives in his mother's house. Since he was very young, he has worked as a driver in his brother's car; with his support, he bought his own car. Nowadays, he works arduously starting very early until late at night offering taxi services to the passersby on the street.  He has been making the payments on his car and so far it is going very well for him. Because of this, when his brother has asked him for a favor he hasn't hestitated to do it for him. What he likes the most about his profession is serving people in a timely manner and sometimes taking people to far away places, as long as he knows them.  In the future, he hopes to have his own taxi service business in his district. This is his fifteenth loan with MFP. He is committed to making his payments on time and considers this loan to be very useful for his business' progress. He will invest it in purchasing different tires and on technical maintenance.  







Es su quinceavo crédito con MFP, por lo que se ha comprometido en pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, considerando éste crédito muy útil para el progreso de su negocio.
Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de otras llantas y en el mantenimiento técnico.

loans.use: To purchase tires and for technical maintenance for his car.

loans.name: Friday

texts.en: Friday is a married forty-seven-year-old man blessed with eight children, living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His dream is to educate his children to higher levels of learning. Friday is a very hard-working and enterprising businessman who started with buying and selling only two goats per week and has gone to fifteen goats per week. The look on his face shows that the business is fulfilling without any major challenges. Friday needs the loan to buy young goats to rear and sell after maturity.

loans.use: Buying young goats to rear and sell at maturity

loans.name: Aurora

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CLORINDA MATTO DE TURNER”; este banco está situado en el distrito de Calca en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Aurora;  La socia tiene 58 años de edad;  ella es casada y tiene 3 hijos, La socia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, ella cría animalitos par la venta final  (cuyes, y aves de corral); La socia también tiene terrenos de cultivo de maíz y papa, ella junto a su esposo alquilan los terrenos y otras veces ellos mismos cultivan los productos para la venta al por mayor a los minoristas. La socia en esta oportunidad solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales menores.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Aurora belongs to the communal bank "Clorinda Matto de Turner."  This bank is located in the Calca district in the Urubamba province of the department of Cusco.

Aurora is 58 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She raises small animals (guinea pigs and barnyard fowl) to sell.  She also has some land for growing corn and potatoes.  She and her husband rent out the land, and at other times they cultivate the products themselves to sell at wholesale to the retail traders.  At this time Aurora requests a loan to invest in the purchase of small animals.  

Aurora appreciates and values the loan granted through these means, and likewise pledges to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy small animals to raise

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CLORINDA MATTO DE TURNER”; este banco está situado en el distrito de Calca en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria;  La socia tiene 57 años de edad;  ella es casada y tiene 3 hijos, La socia se dedica a la administración de su tienda abarrotes, ella trabaja atendiendo la tienda y en esta oportunidad la socia requiere el dinero para comprar mercadería (arroz, fideos, harina, leche, azúcar). La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería para implementar la tienda. 

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Maria belongs to the communal bank "Clorinda Matto de Turner." This bank is located in the Calca district in the Urubamba province of the department of Cusco.

Maria is 57 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She has a grocery store that she manages; she works tending to the store.  Maria requests a loan to invest in purchasing merchandise to restock her store.  At this time she needs money to purchase merchandise such as: rice, noodles, flour, milk and sugar.
 
Maria appreciates and values the loan granted through these means, and likewise pledges to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (rice, noodles, flour, milk, etc.)  to restock her grocery store

loans.name: Enock

texts.en: Enock is a thirty-four-year-old man, married with six children below eighteen years of age, living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. Enock is very hardworking and supportive in looking after twelve of his family members and his desire is to educate the dependents to the level of higher institutions of learning. He trades in cocoa, coffee and maize with an experience of ten years in this business, which is feasible although with a challenge of periodic price fluctuations. Nevertheless, Enock has been able to reap profits and wants to be a wholesale trader; he intends to invest the loan in purchasing cocoa, coffee and maize for resale at a profit.

loans.use: Purchasing cocoa, coffee and maize to resell at a profit

loans.name: Ivania Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora P. M. es soltera, no tiene hijo la única persona a su cargo es su mamá, ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa, calzado y otros artículos que le encargan sus clientes, posee seis años de experiencia en este ramo. Está visitando las oficinas de CEPRODEL ya que quiere un financiamiento para compra de ropa en general que le están demandando sus clientes y así poder tener un poco más de ganancia para seguir sufragando los gastos y manutención de ella y su mamá.
texts.en: Ms. P. M. is single, has no children, and the only person she supports is her mother.  She has a business where she sells clothing, shoes, and other articles that her customers order from her.  She’s been doing this for six years and is asking for this loan through CEPRODEL so that she can buy general clothing articles that her customers have been requesting.  This will create a bit more income for her and will allow her to pay her expenses and continue supporting herself and her mother.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CLORINDA MATTO DE TURNER”; este banco está situado en el distrito de Calca en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Silvia;  La socia tiene 38 años de edad;  ella es casada y tiene 2 hijos, La socia se dedica a la venta de jugos en el mercado central. La socia también vende comidas por las tardes y toda la mañana ella vende jugos en el mercado central en el cual ella tiene su puesto en la sección de jugos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar fruta y vasos para su negocio.

 La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member is part of the Clorinda Matto de Turner Communal Bank; this bank is located in the Calca district in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.

The member is Silvia; she is 38 years old; she is married and has two children. The member sells juice in the central market. The member also sells food in the afternoon, and all morning she sells juice in the central market, where she has her booth in the juice section.The member is requesting the loan to buy fruit and cups for her business.

The member appreciates and values the loan, which has been approved by means of this site, and she promises to make her regular payments in the established time period.

loans.use: Purchase fruit and drinking glasses for her business.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES UNIDAS”; este banco está situado en el distrito de San Sebastian en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Victoria;  La socia tiene  60 años de edad;  ella es casada y tiene 3 hijos,  La socia se dedica a trabajar desde su casa ella es cesante de la carrera de educación;  La socia ahora está en casa trabajando en impresiones y fotocopiadora, ella implemento un pequeño espacio en casa y puso una fotocopiadora ahora ella comprara una impresora. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar una impresora para su negocio.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member is part of the Mujeres Unidas (United Women) Communal Bank; this bank is located in the San Sebastian district in the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Victoria; she is 60 years old; she is married and has three children. The member works from home; she lost her job in education. The member is now doing printing and photocopying out of her home. She set up a small area in her home and installed a photocopier; now she will buy a printer. The member is requesting this loan to purchase a printer for her business.

The member is grateful for this loan, which was authorized through this system. She promises to make her regular payments in the established time period.

loans.use: Purchase a printer for her business

loans.name: Felipe Antonio

texts.es: El señor P. R. tiene un carrito de hot dog y hamburguesa que está ubicado en el km 14 carretera a Ticuantepe, su familia solo es el y su esposa por el momento no tiene hijo, pero está recogiendo para cuando lo tenga, en estos momentos nos visita aquí en CEPRODEL para solicitar un crédito para la compra de carne,  chorizo, gaseosa, pan de hamburguesa, hot dog y maruchan, y así poder sacar un poco más de utilidad para ir dándole un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en: P. R. has a hot dog and hamburger cart located along the 14 kilometer road to Ticuantepe.  His family consists of himself and his wife.  They don’t have children yet, but he is saving up for when they do.  He is asking for this loan through CEPRODEL so that he can buy meat, chorizo, soft drinks, hamburger buns, hot dogs, and Raman.  In this way he can get a little more help and be able to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: Supplies

loans.name: Good Friend Group

texts.en:
Kpannah C., who is holding the sign, is the leader of this group of five borrowers called Good Friend. She is 53 years old, widowed, and has seven children who are between the ages of 13 and 38. She describes herself as a hard-working woman whose goals are to improve her business and build a house. She was not able to attend school due to financial constraints. 

For seven years, Kpannah has been operating a mini restaurant in Stephen Tolbert Estate outside of Monrovia, Liberia. She plans to use her 10,000 Liberian dollars (LRD) portion of this 50,000 LRD group loan to buy more rice, cooking oil, fish, meat, salt, seasonings, etc.

loans.use: To buy food supplies for her restaurant

loans.name: Laura

texts.es: Laura tiene 46 años, una madre de familia muy trabajadora, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos quienes son el motivo de su esfuerzo. Desde que tuvo sus hijos trabaja en diversos oficios, ya que su principal prioridad es sacar adelante a sus hijos. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, siendo estos ofrecidos a sus amigas y vecinos de su barrio. Paralelo a este trabajo, todos los fines de semana, se dedica a preparar tortas y queques, para ello se  trasnochan amasando la masa, además prepara también mazamorra, postres que son vendidos en la puerta de su casa. Lo que más de gusta de su trabajo es la comunicación que mantiene con sus clientes, ya que le genera buenas ganancias económicas que le permiten ayudar en los gastos del hogar. En adelante tiene planeado instalar un bazar, en el que procurar mantenerlo abastecidos de artículos para el hogar. Este es su 25avo crédito con MFP y se compromete en ser puntual en sus cuotas como hasta hoy en día. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más productos de belleza para cumplir con la demanda que tiene con sus clientes.
texts.en: Laura is 46 years old; she is a very hardworking mother. She lives in her own home with her husband and her three children, who are the reason for her hard work. Since she had her children, she has worked various jobs because now her main priority is to see her children succeed. She is currently selling beauty products to her friends and neighbors. In addition to this, every weekend she makes cakes, which has her up all night mixing the dough. She is also makes mazamorra (corn pudding). The desserts are sold in the doorway of her home. The thing she likes most about her work is talking to customers. She generates good income and that helps with household expenses. In the future she plans to set up a hardware store, which she will keep stocked with household goods. This is her 25th loan through Kiva partner MFP, and she promises to be punctual in her payments, just like she has been up until now. With the loan she is requesting, she will purchase more beauty products to keep up with client demand.

loans.use: Stock up on beauty products in order to keep up with client demand

loans.name: Irami

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CLORINDA MATTO DE TURNER”; este banco está situado en el distrito de Calca en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irami;  La socia tiene 29 años de edad;  ella es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo de 7 meses, La socia trabaja vendiendo abarrotes en el mercado modelo de Calca, ella tiene un stand en el cual vende todo tipo de productos de abarrotes. Ella es una mujer muy luchadora y manifiesta que su vida no fue ni es nada fácil, pero cada día al despertar y ver la sonrisa de su bebe la hace sacar fuerzas desde donde no las hay y comienza un nuevo día con muchas ganas de salir adelante y es así como le está yendo. Ella desea implementar su stand de productos de abarrotes para que tenga todo lo que los clientes buscan y le sean leales.  La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de abarrotes (fideos, azúcar, harinas, huevos, condimentos, y mucho mas). 

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Clorinda Matto de Turner Communal Bank; this bank is located in the Calca district in the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco.

The member is Irami; she is 29 years old, she lives with her partner and has one son, who is seven months old. The member sells groceries in the Calca market; she has a stand where she sells all sorts of groceries. She is a fighter; nothing in her life came easy, but every day she wakes up and sees her baby's smile, which makes her draw energy from places where there is no energy and start a new day with great hope of succeeding. This is how she is living. She wants to stock her stand with groceries so she will have everything her customers looking for so they will be loyal. The member is requesting this loan to purchase groceries (pasta, sugar, flour, condiments, and more).

The member is grateful for this loan authorized through this site, and she promises to make her regular payments in the established time period.

loans.use: Purchase products to set up her store

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CLORINDA MATTO DE TURNER”; este banco está situado en el distrito de Calca en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dora;  La socia tiene 47 años de edad;  ella es casada y tiene 3 hijos, La socia se dedica a la venta de animales menores y la socia también tiene una panadería ella administra su panadería junto a su familia. Ella desea mejorar su negocio implementando tinas metálicas y comprando ingredientes para elaborar los panes. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ingredientes e insumos para elaborar panes. 

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Clorinda Matto de Turner Communal Bank; this bank is located in the Calca district in the Urubamba province and department of Cusco.

The member is Dora; she is 47 years old; she is married and has three children. The member sells small animals, and she also has a bread bakery, which she runs with her family. She want to improve her business by buying metal pans and ingredients for making bread. The member requests this loan to purchase ingredients for making bread.

The member is grateful for this loan authorized through this site and she promises to make her regular payments in the established time period.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for making bread

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CLORINDA MATTO DE TURNER”; este banco está situado en el distrito de Calca en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Paulina;  La socia tiene 45 años de edad;  ella es casada y tiene 3 hijos, La socia se dedica al comercio minorista, ella compra y vende frazadas y colchones. La socia invertirá en la compra de mercadería (frazadas); La socia solicita el préstamo para  comprar mercadería. 

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Paulina belongs to the Clorinda Matto de Turner Communal Bank.  The bank is situated in the Calca district, Urubamba province, 
Cusco department.

Paulina, age 45, is married and has three children.  She is a small businesswoman who buys and sells blankets and mattresses.  
She will buy merchandise (blankets).  She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise.

She is grateful for and values the loan granted by this means and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy merchandise
